title: Maritime Smuggling Vessel Identification
description: An analyst must fuse satellite imagery (IMINT) with signals intelligence (SIGINT) to identify a vessel suspected of smuggling.

tasks.description: Analyze satellite imagery to locate a vessel matching the description in a specified search area.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst correctly identifies the target vessel from multiple others in the area.

tasks.description: Correlate the identified vessel's location with SIGINT emissions indicating a known smuggling group.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst successfully links the visual identification with the electronic signature.

tasks.description: Generate an intelligence report with a high-confidence assessment that the vessel is involved in smuggling.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst produces a clear, concise report with all supporting evidence.
